title: Ch4 The Worlds Most Favourite Train 720p x264 AAC HDTV MVGroup.o
description:
The Worlds Most Favourite Train

Travel Documentary hosted by Brian Protheroe, published by Channel 4 in 2015 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/0/03/The-Worlds-Most-Favourite-Train-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

The World's Most Favourite Train
Why would you spend Â£2,000 on a train journey that takes 36 hours and boasts neither wi-fi nor showers, when a Â£30 Easyjet flight could get you there in less than two hours? This jaunty documentary climbs aboard the Venice Simplon-Orient-Express to try to fathom its perennial allure. 
As in Agatha Christie's time, there are plenty of characters to liven up the journey: a fastidious new manager, American passengers who look like they've stepped out of Downton Abbey, and a head chef who reveals he's only deigned to do chips once - for John Travolta's son.
During its nine-month-long season, the Venice Simplon-Orient-Express makes over 60 journeys, covering 150,000 kilometres, with the majority of trips between London and Venice. The train is comprised of 17 unique 1920s carriages that have transported a host of elite individuals across Italy, Switzerland, and Turkey for more than a century. This documentary follows the stories of the staff and passengers as the train makes its way across Europe, with some customers having paid more than Â£2,000 for the privilege.
